did.head: Collection Summary
did.unittitle: Informe sobre el estado de las Provincias Internas a Virrey Fray Don Antonio Bucareli y Ursúa de Don Hugo O'Conor, Real presidio de San Fernando del Carrizal, 30 de Enero de 1776 1772-1779
did.abstract: Holograph report concerning the presidios along Mexico's northern border and O'Conor's years spent as Commandant-Inspector. Also includes additional reports dated September 7, 1775 and October 18, 1779.

repository.label: Repository
repository.corpname: University of Arizona Libraries, Special Collections

did.langmaterial: Materials are in Spanish with partial translation in English.

accessrestrict.head: Restrictions
accessrestrict.p: There are no restrictions on this collection.

prefercite.head: Credit Line
prefercite.p: Informe sobre el estado de las Provincias Internas a Virrey Fray Don Antonio Bucareli y Ursúa de Don Hugo O'Conor, Real presidio de San Fernando del Carrizal, 30 de Enero de 1776 (MS 195). Special Collections, University of Arizona Libraries.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: Acquired as gift of Paul M. Roca, 1980.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Note
scopecontent.p: Holograph report concerning the presidios along Mexico's northern border and O'Conor's years spent as Commandant-Inspector. Also includes additional reports dated September 7, 1775 and October 18, 1779.
Includes partial typescript translation and maps by Paul M. Roca.

relatedmaterial.p: English, typescript translation and historical information available in: Moore, Mary Lu, and Delmar L. Beene. "The Interior Provinces of New Spain: the Report of Hugo O'Conor, January 30, 1776." Arizona and the West, vol. 13, no. 3 (1971): 265.
